releaseNotes: Thanks for using The Potential Project app! This release includes minor bug fixes and some performance improvements.
description:
Would you like to increase your effectiveness and ability to focus as well as your well-being at work? Would you like to perform well without getting stressed or emotionally drained? Want to create the neural network to enable creative thinking to drive innovation?

This app contains simple but powerful mind training exercises to increase presence and ability to focus. There is guidance to cultivate more acceptance, joy, kindness and openness in daily life. The benefits of Mindfulness has been scientifically proven in thousands of research projects which have led to improved physical health, less stress, anger and emotional imbalance, increased compassion, and higher degrees of subjective happiness and well-being.

The Potential Project app will enable you to:
• Listen to mindfulness practices wherever you are on your phone
• Track your progress in terms of total number of minutes training, total number of sessions completed, best daily streak and current daily streak.
• Review weekly, monthly and yearly progress graphs
• Set your goals
• Set Mindful Moment reminders
• Access to Potential Project’s Mental Strategies and Work Techniques which have 
   been developed over 10 years of mind training experience.
• Create practices of custom length with silence and mindfulness bells.
• Follow a pre-planned Corporate Based Mindfulness Training program using the 
   app.
• Access to Potential Project’s Mindfulness Assessment and individualised report.

Monthly Plan

- This is only USD 12.99 per month.
- If you choose to subscribe, your Premium subscription will automatically be renewed each month and will be charged from your credit card through your iTunes account.
- Get access to all our guided meditations, work techniques and mental strategies in the Potential Project library.
- Recurring billing. Cancel anytime.
- Payment will be directly deducted from iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- You can turn off auto-renew any time from your iTunes account settings.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off, at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.

6 Months Plan

- This is only USD 59.99 per 6 months.
- If you choose to subscribe, your Premium subscription will automatically after renew every 6 months and will be charged from your credit card through your iTunes account.
- Get access to all our guided meditations, work techniques and mental strategies in the Potential Project library.
- Recurring billing. Cancel anytime.
- Payment will be directly deducted from iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- You can turn off auto-renew any time from your iTunes account settings.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off, at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.

Annual Plan

- This is only USD 71.99 per year.
- If you choose to subscribe, your Premium subscription will automatically renew every year and will be charged from your credit card through your iTunes account.
- Get access to all our guided meditations, work techniques and mental strategies in the Potential Project library.
- Recurring billing. Cancel anytime.
- Payment will be directly deducted from iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off, at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period.
- Your account will be charged for renewal 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.
